text: Pierre Bédier (born September 30, 1957 in Mont-de-Marsan, Landes) is a member of the National Assembly of France. He represents the Yvelines department, and is a member of the Union for a Popular Movement. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:People from Mont-de-Marsan Category:Politicians from Nouvelle-Aquitaine Category:Rally for the Republic politicians Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:The Republicans (France) politicians Category:Deputies of the 10th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:ESSEC Business School alumni Category:Sciences Po alumni
title: Pierre Bédier
